channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish in Street, 12th August
item.description:
Plastic chicken boxes and other rubbish strewn down both sides of Bannockburn Road. Usual collection of rotting food and rubbish outside Off Licence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bannockburn Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bings outside residential area, 12th August
item.description:
For about a week now there’s been full bins, not collected cleaning crews. Don’t know exactly why. Suspect initially some bins weren’t sorted properly. Now it’s escalated to the situation seen in the attached pictures.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Colomb Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Physical vibration of property from good vehicles, buses and large cars, 12th August
item.description:
I live next to the road and we experience vibration resonance in the building occuring whenever larger vehicles drive past the building. My first concern is that the vehicles are not obeying the speed limit as this would increase the risk of vibration. Second is that there may be unintentional structural problems with the road that are affecting property's adjacent to it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 165, Brecknock Road, Archway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 12th August
item.description:
Someone has flytipped some items. It started with the two plasterboards, then the cardboard furniture box, now Someone has flytipped a chair today. It's starting to become a flytip hotspot. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35-85, Wadhurst Close, Anerley, London

item.title: Barbeque in Cavendish square., 12th August
item.description:
Ongoing problem of aggressive people barbequing and littering in the square. Right next to dried out shrubbery on a very hot day. Very obviously a fire risk and a public health issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cavendish Square, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stinking rubbish bag outside 28 wilton house for two days, 12th August
item.description:
Rubbish yet again dumped outside 28 wilton house, flies are all over the atinking rubbish bag yet they refuse to discard it properly. This is an ongoing problem and yet the council seem to not care that this tenant leaves the place in a mess often with little regard for cleanliness. Please resolve this issue as theres a heatwave and its stinks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albrighton Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
